resources.string:
We believe in the simple principle that creative work requires a special kind of work culture.

We are very careful to maintain a culture that helps attract talented people and helps them achieve their best performance.

This culture starts from work place structure to operating principles of the development teams.

* 5 days a week. From Sunday to Thursday

* Physical Office period: [ 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM ]

* Remote Office period: [ Anytime in a day ]
Two days a week: Friday and Saturday. Yearly company tour sponsored by office authority.
